text: Kirchberg is a municipality in the administrative district of Emmental in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:2011-04-17 Balonveturo (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 154.JPG|Aerial view of Kirchberg File:2010-03-28 Kirchberg (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 048.jpg|Kirchberg ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the municipality of Kirchberg Category:Municipalities in Emmental
title: Kirchberg, Bern
